org.corfudb.universe.group.cluster

Interface CorfuCluster

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cluster, Group
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCorfuCluster, DockerCorfuCluster, VmCorfuCluster

    public interface CorfuCluster
extends Cluster
    Provides a Corfu specific cluster of servers

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.corfudb.universe.group.Group

        Group.GroupParams

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default CorfuServer getFirstServer()
      To find the first corfu server in a cluster: - get all corfu servers in the cluster - extract first element in the list
      LocalCorfuClient getLocalCorfuClient()
      Provides a corfu client running on local machine
      default CorfuServer getServerByIndex(int index)
      Find a corfu server by index in the cluster: - get all corfu servers in the cluster - skip particular number of servers in the cluster according to index offset - extract first server from the list

      • Methods inherited from interface org.corfudb.universe.group.cluster.Cluster

        bootstrap

      • Methods inherited from interface org.corfudb.universe.group.Group

        Provides a corfu client running on local machine
        Returns:

      • getServerByIndex

        default CorfuServer getServerByIndex(int index)
        Find a corfu server by index in the cluster: - get all corfu servers in the cluster - skip particular number of servers in the cluster according to index offset - extract first server from the list
        Parameters:
        index - corfu server position
        Returns:
        a corfu server

        default CorfuServer getFirstServer()
        To find the first corfu server in a cluster: - get all corfu servers in the cluster - extract first element in the list
        Returns:
        the first corfu server
